actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill relating to the sale and distribution of the CONGRESSIONAL RECORD.

summary.text: Allows the Public Printer under the direction of the Joint Committee to sell subscriptions to the daily Record, and current, individual numbers, and bound sets of the Congressional Record. Provides that the price of a subscription to the daily Record and of current, individual numbers and bound sets shall be determined by the Public Printer based upon the cost of printing and distribution and any such price shall be paid in advance. Entitles the Congressional Record to be mailed at the same rates of postage at which any newspaper or other periodical publication, with a legitimate list of paid subscribers, is entitled to be mailed.

titles.title: A bill relating to the sale and distribution of the CONGRESSIONAL RECORD.
